mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 AS BBSNUM,A.* FROM(SELECT * FROM NOTICE) A,(SELECT @ROWNUM:=0) B ORDER BY BBSNUM DESC)C LIMIT #{nowPage},#{scale}
